message.content:
cs.CL, cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.IR, cs.DS 

This paper focuses on neural topic modeling in the context of language analysis, which is a common theme in the natural language processing (NLP) field. Therefore, the most likely category is cs.CL (Computation and Language). The paper also proposes a lifelong learning mechanism, which is a common theme in machine learning and artificial intelligence (AI) research, making cs.LG (Machine Learning) another likely category. The paper also addresses data sparsity, which is a common challenge in information retrieval (IR) and data science (DS), making cs.IR and cs.DS likely categories as well.
